document_data.name: Khalid al-Karim
document_data.mainbody: '''Khalid al-Karim''' was a [[half-elven]] [[rawun]] and member of the [[House of Al-Karim]] in [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|479|Khalid al-Karim}}
document_data.Relationships: Khalid was in love with [[Alia al-Karim]], his clan chieftain's daughter.
document_data.Activities: The start of a recent blood feud between his clan and a wealthy merchant from [[Hiyal]] involving the murder of Alia's brother provided Khalid an opportunity, as he saw it, to prove his worth to her.
document_data.Possessions: Khalid wielded a ''[[jambiya]]'' and [[sling]] during combat. He also carried his drum, some ''[[bracers of defense|bracers of defense AC 6]]'', and a ''[[pouch of accessibility]]''.''
